sentences.en: A secant is defined as line passing through two points of the curve.
sentences.cn: 割线的定义是一条通过曲线上两点的直线.

sentences.en: The roots are extracted in the root sections by method of bisection or secant.
sentences.cn: 采用二分区间求根法或弦截求根法确定故障点.

sentences.en: The slope of secant drawn from the origin through the point is the average function.
sentences.cn: 从原点出发并连接该点所构成的割线的斜率即为曲线的平均函数.

sentences.en: The value of the complement of the secant is called the cosecant.
sentences.cn: 正割函数的倒数，称为余割函数。

sentences.en: Then the numerical results show that new algorithm effectively overcomes the shortcomings of secant method, and evidently improves the convergent speed, convergent range and algorithm stability.
sentences.cn: 数值实验结果表明，这种算法不仅有效克服了割线法的缺陷，而且收敛速度、收敛范围和算法的稳定性也得到明显提高。

sentences.en: This paper mainly deals with the secant method used on stiffness matrix.
sentences.cn: 主要说明割线法在刚度矩阵上的应用.

trans.tran_en: (of an angle) a trigonometric function that in a right-angled triangle is the ratio of the length of the hypotenuse to that of the adjacent side; the reciprocal of cosine
